Rantjs

Procedurally generated text with JavaScript

  View Project Source   Spread the Word

Make a sentence

Other sample sentencens

I need <amount> <adj> <noun.plural> filled with <adj.plural>

The <adj> <noun> <adv> <verb.ed> the <adj> <noun> whilst <adv> being <verb.ed>

<title>, help! He <verb.ed> me and <face.ed> the whole time!

The <adj emotion> doctor stared <adj emotion plural> at the cat

I like my <noun-shape>-shaped <noun-body.plural>

Supported tags

Here's a list of currently supported tags


  <preposition>
  <firstname>
  <activity>
  <adj>
  <adv>
  <amount>
  <color>
  <conj>
  <country>
  <emo>
  <em>
  <face>
  <greet>
  <surname>
  <noun>
  <sound>
  <title>
  <place>
  <prefix>
  <prepos>
  <pron>
  <quality>
  <rel>
  <sconj>
  <substance>
  <timeadv>
  <timenoun>
  <unit>
  <verbimg>
  <say>
  <verb>
  <vocal>
  <yn>

  Additionally, many of the tokens can have subgroups, such as:
  <activity video>
  <activity game>
  <activity board>
  <adj weather>
  <adj emotion>
  <adj nationality>
  <adj appearance>
  <adv emotion>
  <adv sexy>
  <color secondary>
  <color primary>
  <country mediterranean>
  <country caribbean>
  <country oceania>
  <country eurasia>
  <country africa>
  <country middleeast>
  <country southamerica>
  <country asia>
  <country europe>
  <country northamerica>
  <country centralamerica>
  <firstname male>
  <firstname female>
  <noun surface>
  <noun furniture>
  <noun round>
  <noun body>
  <noun liquid>
  <noun insect>
  <noun clothes>
  <noun plant>
  <noun person>
  <noun tool>
  <noun long>
  <noun ball>
  <noun article>
  <noun drug>
  <noun fruit>
  <noun container>
  <noun instrument>
  <noun sex>
  <noun job>
  <noun weapon>
  <noun hole>
  <noun food>
  <noun vehicle>
  <noun animal>
  <noun shape>
  and many more

  Tags such as <noun>, <verb>, <adv>, <place> etc can also have a <em>plural</em> attribute
  <noun plural>, <verb plural>, <adv plural>, <place plural>

Rantjs

Rantjs is a procedural text generator. The goal is to augment human creativity with the boundless potential of randomness.

The project is based on Rant. This implementation is made to be included in JavaScript projects.

Rantjs is created and maintained by Sven A Robbestad

Created and maintained by Sven A Robbestad © 2015. Source code and examples
